name: Trash Bunny House
description:
"Trash Bunny House" is a first-person exploration horror action game. You, as a struggling writer affiliated with a publishing company, are tasked with heading to an abandoned factory deep in the mountains. This factory was once a manufacturing facility for animatronics intended for a certain amusement park. However, it was closed down due to frequent unexplained fatal accidents that occurred during production. There have been rumors of the animatronics, which were supposed to be disposed of, being sighted inside the factory. Your goal is to capture as many scoop photos as possible and make it out alive.

Don't miss your shutter chances:

If something you point your camera at seems like a scoop, a shutter chance notification will be given.
There may be moments where danger is imminent as soon as you point the camera, or precious moments that can't be captured if missed once, so be sure to snap the shutter immediately when the chance notification icon appears.

Playtime:

Approximately 1-2 hours.

Auto-save system:

Auto-saving occurs at specific points.

Multiple ending system:

Each successful scoop photo you capture accumulates points. The endings will vary depending on the number of points.
